name: Fantasy Champions
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Caleb Kohn-Blank, Maret Rudin-Aulenbach and Jonayet Lavin

In Fantasy Champions, you play as a knight, competing in a fight to the death for the honor of being the king's personal protector.

P1: arrow keys (to move), N to attack, H to pick up items

P2: WASD (to move), 1 to attack, Q to pick up items
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
